mapper.select: SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id ORDER BY removeTime desc
SELECT remove_id, COUNT(remove_id) AS yidongnums, stats FROM c_remove GROUP BY stats

SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id where c_remove.department_id = #{departmentId} ORDER BY removeTime desc

SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id WHERE remove_id = #{removeId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM c_remove WHERE remove_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id WHERE c_register.carnumber LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{inorgan},'%' ) order by removeTime desc

SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id WHERE rbieyong2 like CONCAT( '%',#{outorgan},'%' ) order by removeTime desc

SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id WHERE department.department_id = #{0} and c_register.carnumber LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{inorgan},'%' ) order by removeTime desc

SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id WHERE department.department_id = #{0} and rbieyong2 like CONCAT( '%',#{1},'%' ) order by removeTime desc

SELECT remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_remove LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_remove.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_remove.department_id = department.department_id WHERE newNum = CONCAT( '%',#{newnum},'%')
mapper.sql: remove_id, removeTime, inOrgan, outOrgan, department_id, newNum, car_id, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_remove
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into c_remove
remove_id,
removeTime,
inOrgan,
outOrgan,
department_id,
newNum,
car_id,
removeNum,
stats,
notes,
rbeiyong1,
rbieyong2,

mapper.update:
update c_remove
remove_id = #{record.removeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
removeTime = #{record.removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inOrgan = #{record.inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outOrgan = #{record.outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newNum = #{record.newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
removeNum = #{record.removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stats = #{record.stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbeiyong1 = #{record.rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbieyong2 = #{record.rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update c_remove set remove_id = #{record.removeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, removeTime = #{record.removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inOrgan = #{record.inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outOrgan = #{record.outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newNum = #{record.newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, removeNum = #{record.removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stats = #{record.stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbeiyong1 = #{record.rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbieyong2 = #{record.rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_remove
removeTime = #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inOrgan = #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outOrgan = #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newNum = #{newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
removeNum = #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stats = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbeiyong1 = #{rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rbieyong2 = #{rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where remove_id = #{removeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_remove set removeTime = #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inOrgan = #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outOrgan = #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newNum = #{newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, removeNum = #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stats = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbeiyong1 = #{rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbieyong2 = #{rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where remove_id = #{removeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
